data.title: Eric Frank Russell
data.meta_description: Book: Eric Frank Russell - Wasp - Permabooks - Paperback - USA (1959)
data.text:
ppint. ●

14th Apr 2023

science fiction book club h/cvr first printing, for sale only to sfbc members by mail-order by subscription, later also optionally to members of readers union group book clubs

cover (d-j) art by c. w. bacon

cover (d-j) price (5s. 6d. including postage & packing)

204pp? (check) including titles, indicia etc, end p. bound with endpapers between covered boards

(this comment is from another edition of this book)ppint. ●

4th Dec 2019

near-identical editions/printings sharing merkin-printed covers, isbn & included cat#, and hence

cover art by barclay shaw (credited)

208pp. including titles, indica, 3pp. introduction by jack l. chalker etc, end pp. advertising

cover price $2.95 (merkin-printed carcass or "book", as well as covers)

cover price $3.95 (probably canadadian-printed carcass or "book")

(this comment is from another edition of this book)ppint. ●

11th Jun 2019

panther books second p/b edition/printing, with new cat#, new

cover art uncredited, unsigned (treated photographic)

cover price 3/6, australia 60c, new zealand 45c, south africa 45c

so printing should be re-flagged "international" according to respected moderator's rule

- or not so re-flagged, according to equally well-respected moderator's heartfelt plea

cat# is that of first printing plus checksum digit from sbn derived from it, 586-01487-X

144pp. including titles, indica etc, end p. advertising

(this comment is from another edition of this book)
